Object Flight Path: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were at our front door getting some air. These bright stars are plain as day lined up to eachother and taking shape. Three are lined up horizontal, while right next to those are three in the shape of a triangle. The triangle began to take a different shape right before our eyes, sort of a arrowhead shape... We couldnt explain it at all. very freaky. I get scared of acknowledgeing stuff like this. so I am not out there looking at it anymore.
